query: SELECT ID, MUID, VersionName, VersionNumber, Version_ID, VersionFlag, Name, Code, ChangeTrackingMask, [Customer Golden Key_Code] AS Customer_Golden_Key_Code, [Customer Golden Key_Name] AS Customer_Golden_Key_Name, [Customer Golden Key_ID] AS Customer_Golden_Key_ID, [Product_Code] AS Product_Code, [Product_Name] AS Product_Name, [Product_ID] AS Product_ID, [Industry Type_Code] AS Industry_Type_Code, [Industry Type_Name] AS Industry_Type_Name, [Industry Type_ID] AS Industry_Type_ID, EnterDateTime, EnterUserName, EnterVersionNumber, LastChgDateTime, LastChgUserName, LastChgVersionNumber, ValidationStatus FROM [mdm].[Industry Types Exceptions]
